list.name: Default
list.comment:
Usability improvements:
* Invoices, estimates and delivery notes show the total amount in the list view. * Print button has been removed in favour of PDF export

EstimatesController GET #invoice Generates invoice : fges Coverage Results
PaymentMethodsController GET #index assigns all payment_methods as @payment_methods: fges Coverage Results

DeliveryNotesController GET #forward_email fails for customers without email: fges Coverage Results

item.itemvalue: RSpec.User default values User role by default: fges
RSpec.User default values User role by default: fges

task.summary: Default task

Deployment process.
Solved issues with image assets in app layout. CSS will be preprocessed like any other asset.

Deployment process.
Solved issues with image assets in app layout. CSS will be preprocessed like any other asset.

Payment methods.
Annotation for invoice in payment methods now accepts values with more than one line.

Services
Price shown right aligned. Best in place improvements.

Bugfixing
* Solved with estimate validity date. When it was null the application was failing in several points. The label when printing the estimate was not being hide. * Replacement of bootstrap glyphicons by awesome fonts. * Customers country is not a free text anymore. * Vats: More rational column sort.

Bugfixing
* Solved wrong app setup regarding to relative url of the application.

Bugfixing
* Solved missing icons in login page.

Bugfixing
* Invoice payment date: set to invoice date + 15 days by default.

Bugfixing
* Document number accepts series more than one character long.

Bugfixing
* Document number accepts series more than one character long.

Bugfixing
* Discount hidden when 0. * Missing IRPF in invoice.

Bugfixing
* Missing id for customer in documents (invoices, estimates and delivery notes).

Bugfixing
* Invoice annotation of payment method accepts rich format.

Bugfixing
* Rescue when pdf generator fails.

Bugfixing
* PDF generation process were not using the generic blocks for customer and user.

Bugfixing
* Solved issue with i18n settings and custom billing serie for customer.

Bugfixing
* User won't create documents if he don't fills his profile first.

Bugfixing
* User won't create invoices if he don't fills the customer profile first.

Bugfixing
* Several bugs fixed. * Dashboard: First resume finished.

Dashboard.
First version of the dashboard already finished.

Dashboard.
Improvements in the apperance of the dashboard.

Invoicing.
Improvements in the apperance of the invoice

PDF Generation.
Migrating to prawn to avoid stability issues.
Generic parts of the document have been migrated.

PDF Generation.
Migrating to prawn to avoid stability issues.
Invoice detail for PDF document finished.

PDF Generation.
Migrating to prawn to avoid stability issues.
invoice footer already migrated.

PDF Generation.
Invoice pdf generation finished.

PDF Generation.
delivery note pdf generation finished.

PDF Generation.
estimates pdf generation finished.

PDF Generation.
removal of wicked pdf

Tests
Solved issues in specs after changes in invoice process validation.

VAT Grouping
VAT is grouped by vat rate in the invoices.

PDF Invoicing
solved issue with vat, It was followed by a sign, instead of a % sign.

Usability improvements
The button to add a new detail record in master-detail editions become more evident for the user.

Management area.
* Created structure for JSON API. * New model for plans * New controller for admin restricted controller.

Testing features.
Tests for plan model and api/plans controller.

i18n
Translations for plan model.

Bugfixin, service enhacements
* Solved issue when determining the state of an invoice. * Services can be disabled.

Service enhacements
* Management of disabled services.

Paypal support
Deployment changes tu support paypal.yml setup files in capistrano.

Pricing plans
finished logic that manages pricing plans. Related tests are still pending of development.

Pricing plans
Added tests for pricing plans development. Added some tests for helpers. Minor corrections on other tests.

Bugfixing
Solved issue with master detail edition. Improved validation error presentation.

User management
Administrators must have a perpetual license.

Usability improvements and bugfixes
* New users where registered without any role. * Default flag for vat records. * Default payment method was not automatically selected for new invoices. * New flag: send_invoices_to for customers. This way we can maintain two addresses. * Default flags are exclusive. Once you set a vat or a payment method as default any other object set as default will be updated to false.

Usability improvements and bugfixes
* user can maintain in the index view of services the vat rate and the measurement units that apply to the service.

User ban
* Administrators can ban regular users.

invoices
* Paid invoices can't be deleted.

invoices
* IRPF was not showing the negative sign in the pdf

Usability improvements:
* Invoices, estimates and delivery notes show the total amount in the list view. * Print button has been removed in favour of PDF export

Management area.
* Created structure for JSON API. * New model for plans * New controller for admin restricted controller.

Bugfixin, service enhacements

Paypal support

Pricing plans

Pricing plans
Added tests for pricing plans development. Added some tests for helpers. Minor corrections on other tests.

Bugfixing
Solved issue with master detail edition. Improved validation error presentation.

User management
Administrators must have a perpetual license.

Usability improvements and bugfixes
* New users where registered without any role. * Default flag for vat records. * Default payment method was not automatically selected for new invoices. * New flag: send_invoices_to for customers. This way we can maintain two addresses. * Default flags are exclusive. Once you set a vat or a payment method as default any other object set as default will be updated to false.

Usability improvements and bugfixes
* user can maintain in the index view of services the vat rate and the measurement units that apply to the service.

User ban
* Administrators can ban regular users.

invoices
* Paid invoices can't be deleted.
